title: How do books as historical sources help us? - Quora

response.answer_text: As a historical source, a book has ahigh place. it is a valuable source of information. the thing that make it different from other historical sources like coins, fossils, things of past is exactness. in all other cases except written material, we can only guess things related with it. but written material mentions generally if not always the dates of events of that culture or something happened in age of a kingdom in some particular place
